LanguageData.Miho_Tatami.label: Miho Tatami
LanguageData.Miho_TableMachining.label: Miho General Workbench
LanguageData.Miho_TableMachining.description: It is a comprehensive workbench that imitates human 3D printers.
LanguageData.Miho_CraftingSpot.label: Miho Crafting Spot
LanguageData.Miho_CraftingSpot.description: A place for crafting simple Miho items.
LanguageData.Miho_WorkAI.label: Miho Work Assistant AI
LanguageData.Miho_WorkAI.description: A work assistant AI and holographic projector with four built-in personalities. It can be connected to the Shaft Furnace, Celestial Furnace, and General Workbench.
